titles: A proclamation by the lords of the council in the city of Amsterdam for the apprehending of divers ruffians who endeavoured to assassinate their Burghemaster Van Beuningen, on the 16th of March, offering a reward of a 1000 duckatoons to any that shall discover one or more desperate villains.
author: Amsterdam (Netherlands). Raad.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
keywords: Crime --  Netherlands --  Amstersdam --  Early works to 1800.
Criminals --  Netherlands --  Amstersdam --  Early works to 1800.
